MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G71 postcode area of Uddinston. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1.30pm to carry out repairs to an overhead line equipment and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:27pm on Wednesday, 10 February 2021
